#1_4 Notes

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
rc17_six_county <- readr::read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fbriody/data/master/ReportCard2017/rc17_six_county.csv")
rc17<- readr::read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fbriody/data/master/ReportCard2017/rc17.csv")
```


Total schools in each conty:
```{r}
rc17_six_county %>% 
     group_by(county) %>% 
     summarise(n=sum(!is.na(sch_type_name))
     ) %>% 
arrange(desc(n))
```

Types of Schools in McHenry County - use to make freq chart, relfreq chart and bar chart:
```{r}
mchenry_only <- filter(rc17_six_county, rc17_six_county$county == "McHenry")
mchenry_types <- mchenry_only$dist_size_name
mchenry_types
```
